message: What is the next evolution of Facebook? It's all about the funnel.
name: TechCrunch | Facebook’s Revenue Growth Strategy: Ad Targeting By In-App Behavior
caption: techcrunch.com
description: Facebook has an answer to those wondering how it will justify its IPO price and keep revenues growing as it saturates key markets: a new behavioral ad targeting system. Facebook has been quietly rolling out the beta of "Open Graph action spec targeting" which allows advertisers to target users by wh...
